City Council Members
====================

**The City Council is comprised of the Mayor and five Council Members. These dedicated public servants act as the governing body of Jacinto City. Each council member serves as liaison to one of five administrative departments within the city.**

**The City Council meets at the City Hall Annex located at 10301 Market Street. Regular City Council meetings are held at 6:00 PM on the second and fourth Thursdays of each month. Meeting agendas and minutes of past meetings are posted online at www.jacintocity-tx.gov.**

**Office Hours: Call or email for appointment.**

**1301 Mercury Drive**

**Phone : 713-674-8424**

**Fax : 713-675-8525**

| Council Member Name | Picture |
| --- | --- |
| Council Position 1 – Liaison to Parks & Recreation   Jimmy (JJ) Rivas   jj [@jacintocity-tx.gov](mailto:jimmy.rivas@jacintocity-tx.gov) | ![](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Rivas-1-244x300.jpg) |
| Council Position 2 – Liaison to Finance & City Hall   Gregg Robinson   gregg.robinson@jacintocity-tx.gov | ![](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Gregg180-268x300.jpg) |
| Council Position 3 – Liaison to Police & Fire Departments   Allen Lee   allen.lee@jacintocity-tx.gov | ![Lee](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Lee-240x300.jpg) |
| Council Position 4 – Liaison to Water, Sewer, Health & Sanitation Departments   Carmela Garcia   [carmela.garcia@jacintocity-tx.gov](mailto:carmela.garcia@jacintocity-tx.gov) | ![](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Garcia1-241x300.jpg) |
| Council Position 5- Liaison to Streets Department   Mario Gonzales   [mario.gonzales@jacintocity-tx.gov](mailto:mario.gonzales@jacintocity-tx.gov) | ![Mario](https://www.jacintocity-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Mario.jpg) |
